All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvancedEvaluator
    Used for the hard mode AI to choose the best move given the current status of the game board.
    Board
    Tracks the current state of the controller as an array of GamePieces and the current turnNumber
    BoardMove
    Represents a board move, with the index and the correct piece used.
    BoardView
    This class represents the actual tic tac toe controller being displayed in the center of the Main UI.
    ChallengeHandler
    Handles the challenge messages and returns the usernames of the game.
    ConnectHandler
    Handles the connect message, saves the shared secrets, and broadcasts the public key.
    Crypto
    Used to encrypt and decrypt our sensitive data.
    DbConnection
    Represents the database connection on the server, runs the migrations to deal with postgres.
    Game
    Represents a current game in the server.
    GameController
    This class represents a controller for all data and ui functions for the game controller grid pane.
    GameDao
    The logic behind the game database that stores all game history, builds, updates, removes etc.
    GameDaoHandler
    Handles the game database data request message, and resturns the requested data.
    GamePiece
    Describes the chosen state of the grid box, either 'X', 'O', or null (empty space).
    GameView
    This class handles all the UI controls for the game UI, including setting the game AI difficulty and reseting the game.
    GridAlreadyChosenException
    Custom exception that is triggered if either player tries to click a grid box that has already been chosen.
    GridBox
    This class represents a single grid box on the tic tac toe controller.
    HistoryView
    Controller for the history scene, fills the table from the game database.
    HistoryView.TableViewObject
    Object for filling the tableview.
    Init
    Does something idk ask David
    JsonMove
    Represents a board move as a Json object
    Listener<E>
    Listener Interface
    LobbyView
    This object interacts with the lobby page, handles all error checking, and establishes which type of game is to be generated.
    LoginHandler
    Handles the responses from the login attempt
    LoginHandler
    Handles all login messages and sends the correct responses.
    LoginView
    This object interacts with the login page, handles all error checking, and establishes which type of game is to be generated.
    Main  
    MessageDelegator
    Sends the recieved message to the correct registered handler on the server, also handles the presence updates.
    MessageHandler
    Interface for our message handlers.
    Migration
    Migration Interface
    Minimax
    This is the brain of the AI, chooses the best move to make to beat the user.
    MoveHandler
    Handles the responses to the move validation results.
    MoveValidateHandler
    Handles the move validation messages and send a response message.
    Node
    Represents a node in the move decision tree, uses the hard mode AI as the default evaluator.
    NotYourTurnException
    Exception runs when it is not your turn.
    Observable<E>
    Allows for making Observable variables active listeners with a subscribe method.
    Player
    Represents player information.
    PlayerDao
    The logic behind the player database that handles all upkeeping.
    RandomEvaluator
    Easy AI mode, chooses a random move to make against the user.
    SceneCoordinator
    Handles how the scenes switch around the main window.
    Server
    This is the main server, responsible for all database related messages including logins and running games.
    ServerConnection
    This class handles the client to server connection and interactions.
    SignupHandler
    Handles the possible signup messages and responds.
    StaticEvaluator
    Interface for the different types of evaluators, easy or hard, that determine the next move for the computer to make.
    TicTacToeApplication
    Launches the application, interacts with the scene controller to handle swapping scenes.
    WinnerView
    This object interacts with the winner UI that displays the game end state message.
